patthana19.3:4.1: Navipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.3:4.2: Navipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana19.3:5.1: Navipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.3:5.2: Navipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.3:6.2: Nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana19.3:7.1: Hetuyā dvāvīsa, ārammaṇe ekādasa, adhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa … pe … aññamaññe soḷasa … pe … purejāte nava, āsevane cha … pe … vipāke pannarasa … pe … avigate dvāvīsa.
